Enjoy seamless playback, playlist management, and a dynamic audio experience.", + imgSrc: "assets/music.png" + }, + { + title: "Quote Generator", + url: "https://github.com/ianshulx/React-projects-for-beginners/tree/main/quotesgenerator", + description: "Get inspired with our React-based Quote Generator. Discover wisdom, motivation, and creativity at your fingertips, one quote at a time.", + imgSrc: "assets/quote.png" + }, + { + title: "Password Generator", + url: "https://github.com/ianshulx/React-projects-for-beginners/tree/main/react_password_generator", + description: "Boost your online security with our React Password Generator.
